comments.body:
I think it would be better to add cluster_id to templated fields. Then users can retrieve this value from any key by passing `cluster_id="{{ task_instance.xcom_pull('other_task_id', key='custom_key') }}"` :)

Same in other places.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +395,399 @@
    def execute(self, context):
        cluster_id = self.cluster_id or context['task_instance'].xcom_pull(key='cluster_id')
        connection_id = self.connection_id or context['task_instance'].xcom_pull(
            key='yandexcloud_connection_id'
